channel.title: shortcodes on Le Blog Cloud-Guru
channel.description: Recent content in shortcodes on Le Blog Cloud-Guru

item.title: My First Post
item.description: A simple example of bash block code: echo "Date: $(date)" echo "My first post with hugo" An another example of terraform block code: 1 2 3 4 resource "a_resource" "my_resource_name" { key = "value" anotherkey = "another value" } And finally, a graph with mermaid description: graph LR A--B A--C B--D C--D
